participant_1.name: James
participant_1.personality: Curious and enthusiastic about cars and music.
participant_1.background: I love the sweet and juicy flavor of watermelon. I am the youngest of 8 kids. My favorite thing to do is research race cars in my free time. I don't feel like I can be myself around my boss because we're dating. My favorite movie is Dirty Harry.

participant_2.name: Ashley
participant_2.background: I hope my family will understand that I need to make time for my music. Both of my parents are doctors. I sometimes eat candy because it reminds me of my childhood. I live in a house. I have two kids.

content.text: Hi, my name is James. I'm an engineer and I like to research race cars.
Hi James, I'm Ashley. I'm a singer and I hope my family will understand that I need to make time for my music.
That's cool, Ashley. I'm a big fan of music.
Thanks, James. What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm especially into rock and roll.
Nice, me too! What's your favorite band?
My favorite band is Queen.
Oh, nice! I love Queen. They're one of my favorite bands too.
They're so good! I've seen them in concert a few times.
I'm jealous! I've always wanted to see them in concert.
You should! They put on a great show.
I definitely will.
So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I like to sing, play piano, and spend time with my family.
That's cool. I like to research race cars and play video games.
Nice, I used to play video games when I was younger.
Me too. I still play them sometimes, but not as much as I used to.
That's cool. I hope my family will understand that I need to make time for my music.
I'm sure they will. It's important to follow your dreams.
Thanks, James. I appreciate it.
